original_text:
Their webs will not serve as clothing;
    men will not cover themselves with what they make.
Their works are works of iniquity,
    and deeds of violence are in their hands.
korean_text: 그 짠 것으로는 옷을 이룰 수 없을 것이요 그 행위로는 자기를 가릴 수 없을 것이며 그 행위는 죄악의 행위라 그 손에는 포악한 행동이 있으며

sentences.original_text: Their webs will not serve as clothing
men will not cover themselves with what they make
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그들이 만든 것으로 자신을 덮지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: Their works are works of iniquity
and deeds of violence are in their hands
